## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c0d823ab954cd19f85bb933d25f8230386023a6a1fd15430efce0298f6a25aa9)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ui-common-components-angular' @ 1.3.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
